alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Greeley; Howard; Merrick; Nance; Polk; Sherman; Valley; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 07 at 2:38PM CDT until October 08 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected. * WHERE...Valley, Greeley, Nance, Sherman, Howard, Merrick, Polk, York and Fillmore Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 9 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Confidence is relatively high that temperatures will fall to, or below, freezing in these areas due to prolonged clear skies and light winds. A killing freeze of 28 degrees, or colder, is quite possible in low lying areas of Valley and Greeley Counties.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Fillmore; Greeley; Howard; Merrick; Nance; Polk; Sherman; Valley; York
